alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Heard (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haralson, Carroll and northwestern Heard Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 704 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Felton to near Lake Cleburne to near Lake Chinnabee, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Buchanan, Villa Rica, Bremen, Temple, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Waco, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Bowdon Junction, Tyus, Roosterville, Clem, Frolona, Abilene, John Tanner State Park and Lowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for north central, northwestern and west central Georgia.
